thread.title: Scott Baio tells Trevor Noah to shut up over Nordstrom boycott
thread.title_full: Scott Baio tells Trevor Noah to shut up over Nordstrom boycott

author: NICOLE BITETTE
title: Scott Baio tells Trevor Noah to shut up over Nordstrom boycott
text:
Scott Baio tells Trevor Noah to shut his pie-hole after comedian mocks him for Nordstrom boycott Scott Baio tells Trevor Noah to shut up over Nordstrom boycott Scott Baio and Trevor Noah were involved in Twitter banter on Tuesday after the comedian took a jab at Baio’s decision to boycott Nordstrom. (Evan Agostini/Invision/AP)  14 PM 
Scott Baio does not find Trevor Noah's jokes very funny. 
The outspoken Trump supporter fired back at the comedian after Noah responded to Baio's tweet about boycotting Nordstrom, joking that he was a cashier at the store. 
"That sucks for Nordstrom now they have to find another cashier??," Noah said in response to Baio's boycott declaration. 
The "Happy Days" star shot back at the funnyman, writing "When you, @Trevornoah learn what it means to be an American then you'll have a say. Until then enjoy our $ and shut your pie-hole!" — Scott Baio (@ScottBaio) February 14, 2017 
Baio's decision to stop shopping at the luxury department store comes on the heels of the company's decision to drop President Trump's daughter Ivanka's fashion brand. 
The store's decision led countless celebrities — and other Trump detractors — to rush to shop at the store to show their support for the decision. 
Nordstrom publicly declared that the decision was based on numbers and not politics. The store's decision led countless celebrities — and other Trump detractors — to rush to shop at the store to show their support for the decision. (Evan Vucci/AP) 
Noah, a South African native, said on his show on in March that he does not have U.S. citizenship nor does he have a green card. 
The "Daily Show" host reportedly moved to America in 2011. Comedy Central films his late night show in New York City. Join the Conversation:
